data.name: DevFest Atlanta 2019
data.description: The 3rd annual DevFest Atlanta is a one-day tech conference that delivers a diverse range of Google-related and community talks.

relatedRecords.name: Engineering Leadership Summit 2020
relatedRecords.description: Code Climate provides automated code review for your apps, letting you fix quality and security issues before they hit production. We check every commit, branch and pull request for changes in quality and potential vulnerabilities. If an issue is found, you’re notified immediately - it’s that simple…

relatedRecords.name: Stir Trek
relatedRecords.description: Stir Trek is a one-day conference in Columbus, Ohio focused on teaching software developers the latest and greatest in technologies, techniques, and tools. The full day of content is always concluded with a private screening of a blockbuster film on its opening day.
